item.title: Val Kilmer Celebrates 30th Anniversary Of One Of His Best Roles With Heartwarming BTS Videos
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYVal Kilmer celebrates the 30th anniversary of Tombstone by sharing behind-the-scenes videos. Kilmer also played Bruce Wayne/Batman in Batman Forever, his only portrayal of the iconic character. Kilmer’s career slowed down in the 21st century, but he made a triumphant return in the Top Gun sequel. Literature ReviewVal Kilmer celebrates the 30th anniversary of his role in 1993’s Tombstone through sharing some charming behind-the-scenes videos from the movie.

item.title: Val Kilmer s Missed Casting In This Beloved 90s Space Movie Ruined A Tombstone Reunion
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYVal Kilmer turned down the role of Jack Swigert in Apollo 13 to star in The Ghost and the Darkness instead. Kilmer’s decision cost him a reunion with his former Tombstone co-star Bill Paxton, who played Fred Haise in Apollo 13. Despite missing out on Apollo 13, Kilmer’s career has many highlights, with Tombstone being one of them. Literature ReviewTombstone will always be one of Val Kilmer’s most memorable movies, but he could have reunited with a co-star and had another career highlight.

item.title: Venom 3 Logo First Look Revealed & Hints At Big Change From Let There Be Carnage
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYVenom 3’s new logo features a red number 3 behind the franchise’s logo, sparking speculation about its significance. Some fans desire a subtitled official title or a pun like “V3NOM” to match the movie’s humor. The return of Carnage is uncertain, as Venom killed it in the previous movie, but the title may hold a hidden meaning related to other symbiotes. Literature ReviewThe new Venom Movie relies on a different visual choice as compared to the previous two instalments.

item.title: Venom 3 Villain Revealed By Logo - Theory Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYVenom 3’s new logo seems to tease a potential new Marvel villain for the upcoming film. The inclusion of Toxin as a potential villain makes sense, considering its connection to Carnage and its status as a third-generation symbiote. Introducing Toxin as a villain in Venom 3 could be risky due to similarities with previous symbiote villains in the franchise, potentially leading to repetitive fight scenes. It may be more effective to expand Venom’s enemies beyond symbiotes and introduce a visually distinct threat.

item.title: Vin Diesel & Dwayne Johnson s Fast & Furious Feud Theory Settled By Franchise Director
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDirector Justin Lin acknowledges the peculiar staging of a scene in Fast & Furious 6 between Vin Diesel and Dwayne Johnson, claiming that the scene’s odd look is due to the uneven ground. The scene in question sees Diesel and Johnson speaking to each other but appearing to be very far apart and looking over each other’s shoulders, sparking theories that they filmed the scene separately. Reports of a feud between Diesel and Johnson first emerged in 2016 during the production of The Fate of the Furious, but the two actors have now seemingly buried the hatchet.

item.title: Walter Koenig s 10 Best Star Trek Chekov Moments
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEnsign Chekov brought youthful energy and charm to the Star Trek crew, attracting a younger audience. Chekov’s wit and charm added humor to the show, making him a fan favorite among viewers. Walter Koenig’s portrayal of Chekov in various Star Trek episodes and movies showcased his acting prowess. Literature ReviewHere are the best moments of Walter Koenig as Star Trek: The Original Series’ iconic Russian Starfleet Officer, Pavel Chekov.

item.title: Warner Bros. Is Currently Dominating Netflix On Their Own Service
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWarner Bros. movies are currently dominating Netflix’s Top 10, surpassing Netflix originals in popularity. The inclusion of Warner Bros. movies on Netflix is unexpected, considering Warner Bros. has its own streaming service called Max. The deal between Netflix and Warner Bros. benefits both companies and has brought more attention to the streaming platform. Literature ReviewWarner Bros. movies are seeing a massive surge of popularity on Netflix, and here’s which ones are succeeding and why they are on the platform.

item.title: WB Failed Aquaman In 4 Different DCEU Releases & Set Him Up For Disaster
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAquaman’s cool factor was undermined in the DCEU due to comedic meta-gags and repetitive insults, impacting Jason Momoa’s performance. The DCEU’s insults towards Aquaman in previous films, including Justice League and The Flash, contribute to the de-cooling of the character. DC’s anti-mythologizing of Aquaman was a mistake, as it detracts from building up the character’s mythology and undermines his impact before The Lost Kingdom’s release. Literature ReviewAquaman’s DCEU swansong was nowhere near the success of his first solo movie, and the franchise film-makers themselves deserve some blame.

item.title: Wes Anderson & Bill Murray To Reunite In Historic 10th Movie Collaboration
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWes Anderson and Bill Murray are teaming up for their tenth film collaboration. Murray has been in Anderson’s movies since 1998, when he played Herman Blume in Rushmore. Murray recently appeared in Anderson’s 2021 film The French Dispatch, but did not appear in Anderson’s 2023 film, Asteroid City. Literature ReviewAuteur director Wes Anderson casts longtime collaborator Bill Murray again in his next movie, marking the pair’s tenth film collaboration.

item.title: What 2024 s SAG Awards Nominations Mean For The Best Picture Oscars Race
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSAG Awards nominations can provide insight into which movies are likely to receive Best Picture nominations at the 2024 Oscars. Winning the SAG Awards’ Outstanding Performance by a Cast in a Motion Picture category often leads to Best Picture success at the Oscars. While SAG nominations can boost a film’s chances, they do not guarantee a Best Picture nomination, and some nominees may miss out. Literature ReviewThe SAG Awards nominations will have a big impact on the Best Picture Oscars race in 2024.

item.title: What Caused The Plane To Crash In Society Of The Snow
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSociety of the Snow is a true-to-life survival-thriller film based on the Uruguayan Andes flight disaster of 1972. The film accurately portrays the events of the plane crash and doesn’t sensationalize or cheapen the story. Society of the Snow focuses on the resilience and emotional truth of the survivors, rather than just the crash itself. Literature ReviewWhile the plot of Society of the Snow has been discussed at length, viewers & newcomers to the story alike are wondering what caused the plane crash.

item.title: What Clint Eastwood Told Jeff Daniels About The Dumb & Dumber Toilet Scene
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYClint Eastwood surprisingly related to the infamous toilet scene in Dumb and Dumber, sharing a similar experience with Jeff Daniels. Eastwood’s comment shows that humor can connect people from different backgrounds, even someone known for serious roles like Eastwood. Eastwood and Daniels collaborated on the film Blood Work, showcasing their versatility and mutual respect for each other’s craft. Literature ReviewThe Dumb and Dumber toilet scene is an iconic moment in comedy cinema, and veteran actor-director Clint Eastwood had a shocking response to the scene.

item.title: What Godzilla x Kong s Baby Kong Real Name Means To The Monsterverse s New Movie
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe reveal of an adolescent member of Kong’s species in the Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire trailer has left fans curious about the mini-Kong’s origins and role in the upcoming movie. The child, named Suko, shares more physical characteristics with the new ape foe, Skar King, rather than with Kong. However, it is not hostile and might align with Kong and Godzilla against Skar King. Suko’s name, meaning “essential child” when written phonetically in Japanese, suggests that the juvenile Kong could have a significant role in the battle between the Titans and may hold importance for the Monsterverse’s future.

item.title: What Happened To Every Real Character After Moneyball
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMoneyball revolutionized baseball and transformed player evaluation and team management, impacting sports across the United States. The use of data analytics became an essential tool for sports franchises to optimize performance and gain a competitive edge. The aftermath of Moneyball sparked debates on the diminishing role of intuition in sports and the potential dehumanization of the game. Literature ReviewThe real people involved in Moneyball took different paths after the As historic 2002 season.

item.title: What Happened To Every Real-Life Survivor After Society Of The Snow
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY“Society of the Snow” is a gripping film that retells the incredible true story of the 1972 Andes plane crash and the survivors’ struggle to stay alive for 72 days. The film features a talented cast of South American actors, many of whom are making their feature film debut, adding authenticity to the story. Since the plane crash, some survivors went on to achieve remarkable accomplishments, such as becoming doctors, authors, motivational speakers, businessmen, and even running for political office.

item.title: What Happened To Every Surviving Hunger Games Character After Ballad Of Songbirds & Snakes
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Ballad of Songbirds & Snakes expands the Hunger Games universe by providing valuable context on how the series’ antagonist, Coriolanus Snow, came to power and became the president of Panem. Details of some main characters’ lives are revealed in the prequel novel and The Hunger Games Films, allowing audiences to piece together their futures. The Hunger Games showcases Snow’s manipulative nature and his deep-seated hatred for Katniss, stemming from his unresolved feelings for Lucy Gray, which ultimately leads to his downfall and death during the rebellion.

item.title: What Happened To Hell Camp s Steve Cartisano
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY“Hell Camp: Teen Nightmare” sheds light on the controversial Challenger Foundation, a therapy camp for troubled teens founded by Steve Cartisano, who faced backlash after the truth about the camp’s conditions came out. The Challenger Foundation subjected teens to awful treatment and forced them to hike 500 miles in the desert, resulting in the death of a 16-year-old girl from heatstroke. Cartisano was found not guilty of child abuse charges but settled a lawsuit with the girl’s parents.

item.title: What Happened To John Connor In Every Terminator Timeline
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Terminator franchise features multiple versions of the future resistance leader John Connor, creating complex and conflicting timelines. The original Terminator timeline creates a paradox and relies on time travel interventions for John Connor’s existence. Different timelines in the franchise show John fulfilling or not fulfilling his role as the leader of the resistance against Skynet. Literature ReviewThe future leader of the resistance in the war against machines John Connor has seen many different fates across contradictory Terminator timelines.

item.title: What Happened To Mollie & Ernests Children After Killers Of The Flower Moon
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY“Killers of the Flower Moon” tells the true story of the Osage murders in the 1920s through the lens of Ernest Burkhart and Mollie, and their children continue the legacy. The movie focuses on the Burkharts’ roles in the murders, but also highlights the impact of their children on Ernest’s actions. James ‘Cowboy’ Burkhart and Elizabeth Burkhart, the children of Ernest and Mollie, faced hardships and had their own stories after the events of the movie.

item.title: What Happened To Mollie Burkhart After Killers Of The Flower Moon
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMartin Scorsese’s Killers of the Flower Moon tells the tragic story of the Osage murders through the eyes of Osage Mollie Burkhart. Mollie Burkhart divorced her husband Ernest after discovering his involvement in the murder of her sister and his attempt to poison her. Mollie regained control of her family’s wealth and ended her guardianship, securing her rightful claim to her land and exposing corruption in the area. Literature ReviewAfter the tragic events depicted in Killers of the Flower Moon tore apart her Osage family, Mollie Burkhart remarried and stayed in Oklahoma.

item.title: What Happened To Pamela In Saltburn (& The Real Meaning Of Her Fate)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCarey Mulligan’s performance as Pamela in Saltburn is brief but unforgettable, leaving her character’s fate uncertain. Pamela is introduced as a friend of Felix’s mother, Elspeth, who is hiding out from her dangerous ex-boyfriend. Pamela’s death is ruled as an apparent suicide, but that’s not the whole story. Literature ReviewCarey Mulligan’s brief but unforgettable performance as Elspeth’s friend Pamela gave Saltburn one of its greatest characters. What was her fate?

item.title: What Happened To Tim Ballard After Sound Of Freedom
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTim Ballard, a former agent with the Department of Homeland Security and the subject of 2023 movie Sounf of Freedom, founded Operation Underground Railroad (O.U.R.) in 2013 to combat sex trafficking and has since saved over 7,000 lives. Ballard’s testimony before Congress in 2015 led to reforms in the fight against sex trafficking, including increased cooperation with other countries. While Ballard has faced allegations and controversies, including investigations into O.

item.title: What Happens To Every Member Of Dmitri s Gang In The First Purge
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDimitri Cimber, the leader of the gang, survives the first Purge despite being heavily injured. Lorenzo, one of Dimitri’s lieutenants, sacrifices himself to save Dimitri from the NFFA’s drones. Blaise, a fierce and loyal member of the gang, is killed alongside 7 & 7 and Lorenzo by the NFFA’s drones. Literature ReviewThe First Purge has an exceptionally high kill count, with few members of Dimitri’s gang potentially making it out alive.

item.title: What Jamie Lee Curtis Requested When Filming True Lies Big Stunts
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYJamie Lee Curtis requested a knife and wire cutters for her safety during the helicopter and limousine stunts in True Lies. The actress was willing to do dangerous stunt work herself, but took minor precautions to ensure she could escape if something went wrong. Jamie Lee Curtis also did most of her own stunts in Everything Everywhere All At Once, showing her fearlessness in on-screen danger. Literature ReviewWhen filming True Lies, Jamie Lee Curtis did some of her own stunts - and had only one request to make them safer.

item.title: What Josh Gad Regrets About His LeFou Character In Beauty And The Beast
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYLeFou’s portrayal as a gay character in Beauty and the Beast was not explicitly clear, leading to criticism and accusations of queerbaiting. Actor Josh Gad, who played LeFou, expressed regret that the film did not go further in depicting a gay character in a Disney movie. Critics and Gad believe that if LeFou was intended to be Disney’s first openly gay character, it should have been made more explicit and handled better in the film.

item.title: What Really Happened To Farleigh In Saltburn
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFarleigh is cut off by the Catton family and sent back to America after Oliver frames him for Felix’s death in Saltburn. Oliver’s plan to inherit Saltburn likely involves killing off most of the Catton family, including Farleigh. Farleigh’s fate is left ambiguous, but it is possible that Oliver plans to kill him before he can return and reclaim Saltburn. Literature ReviewFarleigh is one of the most interesting characters in Saltburn, but the film doesn’t make his fate clear - so here’s what really happened.

item.title: What Saltburn s Egg Scene Actually Means
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe egg scene in Saltburn emphasizes how out of place Oliver is and highlights his lack of familiarity with the estate’s customs and lifestyle. The scene raises the question of whether the egg incident was part of Oliver’s plan to manipulate the Cattons and steal the estate. The egg scene serves as a turning point for Oliver, showing him that he can get whatever he wants at Saltburn and empowering him to manipulate the Cattons to his advantage.

item.title: What The Different Eye Colors Mean In The First Purge
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe different colored contact lenses in The First Purge serve as a symbol of the characters’ political affiliations and feelings towards the purge, with blue representing support, red representing opposition, and green representing neutrality. The colors of the contact lenses also align with American political parties, with red for Republicans, blue for Democrats, and green for third parties. This further reflects the characters’ actions and beliefs within the film. The use of color symbolism extends beyond the contact lenses, with red symbolizing the bad guys and blue symbolizing the good guys throughout the movie.

item.title: What The Golden Globes 2024 Mean For The Oscars 5 Biggest Takeaways
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGolden Globe winners could continue to dominate at upcoming award ceremonies, shaping the race for the 96th Oscars. Ryan Gosling’s frontrunner status for Best Supporting Actor may be challenged after losing at the Golden Globes. Christopher Nolan has a strong chance of winning Best Director at the 96th Academy Awards, based on his Golden Globe win. Literature ReviewThe 2024 Golden Globe Awards were held a couple of months before the Oscars, and the winners indicate what could happen at the upcoming ceremony.

item.title: What The Peaky Blinders Movie Finally Happening Means For The Franchise
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Peaky Blinders movie and spinoffs will expand the franchise by exploring different time periods and characters. The Polly Gray spinoff is likely a prequel that will delve deeper into her backstory and honor the late Helen McCrory’s portrayal. The Peaky Blinders movie will introduce new characters and potentially serve as a prologue for the Boston spinoff, which could focus on Tommy’s business dealings in the United States and Alfie Solomons’ familial ties.

item.title: What The Transformers Franchise Would Have Looked Like Without Michael Bay
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMichael Bay’s directorial style brought the U.S. military as a major focus in the Transformers franchise, which was not present in the original animated series. Bay’s version of Transformers heavily emphasized human characters, deviating from the source material where the Autobots were the main focus. The G1 designs of the Transformers were not used in Bay’s films, but a different director could have incorporated them from the start, satisfying both mainstream and nostalgic audiences.

item.title: What Tom Cruise s New Movie Plans Mean For Mission Impossible s Future
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTom Cruise’s new deal with Warner Bros. to create new movies and franchises sparks questions about the future of the Mission: Impossible franchise. Mission: Impossible 8 is still happening and is currently in production, set to be released in 2025, but the future of the franchise beyond that remains uncertain. Tom Cruise’s Warner Bros. deal doesn’t mean the end of Mission: Impossible, as he can still continue developing more movies with Paramount if both sides are interested.

item.title: When The Mandalorian & Grogu Will Take Place In The Star Wars Timeline
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Mandalorian & Grogu will be set within the New Republic era, specifically around 10-11 ABY, which is about 22 years before the events of the Star Wars sequel trilogy. The timeline of the Star Wars universe during the New Republic era is not entirely clear due to the number of projects taking place at the same time, including The Mandalorian, The Book of Boba Fett, and Ahsoka. The release dates for The Mandalorian & Grogu and Ahsoka season 2 have not been announced yet, and more information about the movie’s timeline is expected to be revealed once production begins later this year.

item.title: Where Elsa Goes At The End Of Frozen 2 & What It Means For Frozen 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYElsa’s journey to Ahtohallan in Frozen 2’s ending sets up the story for Frozen 3, as it focuses on identifying the mysterious fifth spirit. While it is likely that Elsa is the fifth spirit, Frozen has a history of subverting expectations, leaving room for alternative possibilities. The plot of Frozen 3 will likely pick up from Ahtohallan, where another disturbance similar to the one that started Frozen 2’s story will set the sequel in motion.

item.title: Where Exactly The Rugby Teams Plane Crashes In Society Of The Snow
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSociety of the Snow is a faithful retelling of the tragic 1972 Andes flight disaster, which emphasizes the remoteness of the crash location. The survivors of Uruguayan Air Force Flight 571 endured extreme cold, injuries, and starvation for 72 days in the isolated Valley of Tears. The altitude of the crash site, at 11,710 feet, posed a major challenge for the survivors and made rescue attempts incredibly difficult. Literature ReviewThe plane crash in Society of the Snow constitutes the main element of the movie’s plot.

item.title: Where Margot Robbie s Harley Quinn Could Appear In James Gunn s DC Universe
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHarley Quinn could potentially appear in “The Brave and the Bold” Batman film, bringing a new dynamic to her conflicted relationship with the Dark Knight. Margot Robbie’s return as Harley Quinn in the upcoming “Waller” TV show makes sense due to the established connection between Quinn and Amanda Waller in the DCEU. Reviving the shelved “Gotham City Sirens” project in the DCU would provide the perfect story for Harley Quinn’s appearance, rectifying the disappointment of its cancellation in the DCEU.

item.title: Where Princess Peach Came From 6 Biggest Super Mario Movie 2 Theories
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Super Mario Bros Movie 2 may explore Princess Peach’s origins and where she came from before the Mushroom Kingdom, providing answers to her mysterious past. The film could suggest that Peach is from Earth, as hinted in the first movie, aligning her with Mario and other human characters from New York. The sequel could introduce new worlds, such as Metro Kingdom or Sarasaland, to connect with Peach’s origin story or even create a completely new world to expand the Mario franchise.

item.title: Where Rogue One s Other Major Characters Are During Andor Season 1
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAndor season 1 takes place five years before the Battle of Yavin, featuring familiar characters from Rogue One like Cassian Andor. Characters like Galen Erso, Bail Organa, and Darth Vader were active during this time, playing crucial roles in the Rebellion against the Empire. However, characters like Leia Organa, Baze Malbus, and Jyn Erso were either too young or had not yet joined the Rebellion during this period. Literature ReviewDespite the fact Andor follows one of the protagonists of Rogue One, many characters did not make an appearance as they were busy elsewhere.

item.title: Where To Watch I.S.S. Showtimes & Streaming Status
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYI.S.S. is a sci-fi thriller directed by Gabriela Cowperthwaite about astronauts on the International Space Station dealing with a global conflict on Earth. The movie features a talented cast including Ariana DeBose, Chris Messina, Pilou Asbæk, and John Gallagher Jr., making it worth watching. I.S.S. will be released in theaters on January 19, 2024, with no direct competition, giving it a chance to find an audience. Streaming and digital release dates are yet to be announced.

item.title: Where To Watch Mean Girls 2024 Showtimes & Streaming Status
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe highly anticipated Mean Girls musical movie will be released in theaters on January 12, 2024, before its streaming release on Paramount+. The 2024 adaptation retains the iconic story and characters from the original film, with modern updates and more song and dance sequences. Audiences will have the option to watch Mean Girls on digital platforms in February 2024, offering a more cost-effective viewing option for larger groups. Literature ReviewThe 2024 musical adaptation of Mean Girls puts a new spin on a familiar story, and there are options regarding where to watch Mean Girls 2024.

item.title: Where To Watch Night Swim Showtimes & Streaming Status
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNight Swim, the new horror movie from Blumhouse, will be released in theaters on January 5, 2024, making it the first major release of the year. Blumhouse and Universal have a history of releasing movies on streaming platforms roughly eight weeks after their theatrical debut, so Night Swim could potentially be available on Peacock in late February or early March 2024. If Night Swim doesn’t perform well at the box office, it may be released on digital platforms for purchase or rental by the end of January 2024.

item.title: Where To Watch The Beekeeper Showtimes & Streaming Status
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYJason Statham’s action movies are enjoyed by audiences in multiple formats, including theaters and streaming. The Beekeeper will have an exclusive theatrical release before becoming available on Prime Video. It is unclear when the streaming release or digital release of The Beekeeper will occur, but it is expected to be on Prime Video and may not be available on other platforms. Literature ReviewThe Beekeeper is a new action movie directed by David Ayer and starring Jason Statham, and this is where to watch it in theaters or at home.

item.title: Where To Watch The Book Of Clarence Showtimes & Streaming Status
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Book of Clarence, directed by Jeymes Samuel, is an original story set in Biblical times and follows a man named Clarence who tries to become a new Messiah. The film had a highly anticipated theatrical release on January 12, 2024, following positive reviews at the 67th London Film Festival in October 2023. While the movie initially has an exclusive theatrical release, it is expected to be available for streaming on Netflix in May 2024 and later on Hulu, with a potential digital release in March 2024.

item.title: Where To Watch The Holdovers
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Holdovers, directed by Alexander Payne, received well-deserved awards at the 2024 Golden Globes, with Paul Giamatti winning Best Actor and Da’Vine Joy Randolph winning Best Supporting Actress. The film, set during a school’s winter break, is available to stream on Peacock for those with a paid premium subscription. If you don’t have Peacock, you can purchase The Holdovers digitally on various platforms, but it’s also still screening in select theaters.

item.title: Where To Watch Trolls Band Together Online
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTrolls Band Together released in theaters on November 17, 2023, in the U.S. and Canada, following successful releases in Europe, Brazil, and Mexico. The Trolls 3 digital release was on December 19, 2023, and is available to rent or buy on several major platforms, including Amazon Prime Video. The film is expected to be available for streaming in March 2024. It will first appear on Peacock, following the pattern of previous DreamWorks Animation releases.

item.title: Which Brings Me To You Review Lucy Hale & Nat Wolff Falter In Dull, Heatless Romantic Comedy
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe exploration of Will and Jane’s failed romances is intriguing, but Which Brings Me to You is too flat for it to work. The candidness of the characters can be enjoyable, but it hasn’t mastered the walk and talk style of other romances. Lucy Hale and Nat Wolff have no chemistry, and the film is tonally inconsistent. Literature ReviewLucy Hale & Nat Wolff may be trying to shine, but the story is far too flat & they have very little chemistry to consider this a successful romance.

item.title: Who Is Tigris Snow & What Happened To Her In The Hunger Games
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes is a prequel to The Hunger Games that delves into the early life of President Coriolanus Snow and explores his family dynamics, particularly his close relationship with his cousin, Tigris Snow. Tigris Snow, played by Hunter Schafer, is a significant character in the prequel and goes through a transformation in her appearance, taking on tiger-like features. She becomes involved in the rebellion against Snow and plays a crucial role in aiding Katniss and the resistance.

item.title: Who Plays John Wick s Wife Helen In The Movies
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBridget Moynahan plays an important role as John Wick’s deceased wife Helen, appearing through flashbacks and photographs. Moynahan’s exceptional acting skills make her an integral and memorable part of the John Wick franchise. Besides her role in John Wick, Moynahan has had major roles in TV shows like Blue Bloods and Six Feet Under, as well as films like Coyote Ugly and Ford Fairlane. Literature ReviewThe John Wick movies all feature the titular character’s wife, Helen, in an important but unconventional way, and here’s who plays her.

item.title: Who Plays Linda In Fargo Season 5
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYLinda’s character in season 5 of Fargo has a lasting impact and helps move the story along. Linda’s role in the show provides valuable context to Dot’s trauma and personal development. The actress who plays her is well known for her roles in Covert Affairs and The Night Agent,. Literature ReviewSeason 5 of FX’s TV show Fargo introduces viewers to an important character named Linda, who is played by a seasoned and talented actress.

item.title: Who Really Made All The Paintings In Good Grief
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGood Grief explores the complexities of grief and healing through a comedic lens, showing that grief isn’t always linear or painful. Marc’s journey includes discovering hidden secrets about his late husband and confronting unresolved feelings about his mother’s death. The film emphasizes the importance of confronting pain and using artistic expression as a means of processing grief and preserving memories. Literature ReviewDan Levy’s latest feature film has viewers wondering who really made all the paintings in Good Grief, which play a key role in Marc’s (Levy) story.

item.title: Why 2024 Is The Most Important Year For The MCU Since Endgame
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY2024 will be a make-or-break year for the Marvel Cinematic Universe as they aim to regain momentum after a disappointing 2023. The success of the MCU’s television shows in 2024 will determine if Marvel Studios’ restructuring efforts have paid off. The absence of Kang the Conqueror and the potential introduction of a new villain will shape the future of the Multiverse Saga in the MCU. Literature ReviewThe MCU will be looking to regain momentum after the franchise’s failures of 2023, making 2024 the most decisive for Marvel since Endgame.

item.title: Why 23 Jump Street Never Happened
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY23 Jump Street was canceled despite the success of the first two movies and the potential for numerous sequel possibilities. The idea of a crossover with the Men in Black franchise, titled MiB 23, was leaked during the Sony hack but struggled to move past the development stage. The ambitious nature of the crossover may have been too much, as Jonah Hill believed it was too high stakes and could have ruined the comedic nature of both franchises.

item.title: Why A Backwards “99” Appears At The End Of Back To The Future 2
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe fiery “99” seen in the sky at the end of Back to the Future Part II is simply a side effect of the DeLorean being in the air and spinning after being struck by lightning. The lightning strike caused the DeLorean to spin uncontrollably, eventually reaching the necessary 88mph to travel through time. While there are theories about the significance of the “99” and its connection to the past and future of the series, the screenwriter Bob Gale explains that it is merely a result of the DeLorean’s launch and has no deeper meaning.

item.title: Why A Bourne Legacy Sequel With Jeremy Renner Fell Apart Revealed By Director
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTony Gilroy’s The Bourne Legacy introduced a new franchise protagonist with Aaron Cross, played by Jeremy Renner. Director Justin Lin reveals that he was in development on a sequel to the film with Renner, but Matt Damon’s decision to reunite with Paul Greengrass for 2016’s Jason Bourne essentially killed the project. Although The Bourne Legacy’s reviews were mixed, the film introduces new elements and characters that would have been interesting to explore in a sequel.

item.title: Why Arwen Didn t Fight In Any Major Lord Of The Rings Battles
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYIn Tolkien’s books, Arwen never fought because she was not a warrior. Jackson’s movie changes made her absence from battles seem strange. Jackson replaced Glorfindel with Arwen in the movie to give her a bigger role. However, Arwen’s lack of combat ability in the books made her absence expected. The Elves were leaving Middle-earth in Tolkien’s story, so their focus was on defending their own people and settlements. Therefore, they never took part in Aragorn’s battles either.

item.title: Why Bad Boys 2 s Budget Was Enormously High (& What Bad Boys For Life Learned)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBad Boys 2 had a significantly higher budget than its predecessor, which affected its overall profitability despite its higher box office returns. Sony Pictures invested heavily in the sequel, believing it would surpass the success of the first film, but ultimately overestimated its appeal and overspent. Learning from their mistake, the studio scaled back the budget for Bad Boys for Life, and it proved to be a successful and profitable strategy.

item.title: Why Christian Slater Was Cast In Interview With The Vampire
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYChristian Slater replaced River Phoenix in Interview with the Vampire after Phoenix’s tragic death. Slater was initially worried about taking on Phoenix’s character due to the circumstances surrounding his passing. Slater still wonders what happened to his character, Daniel, as the movie ends on a cliffhanger. Literature ReviewChristian Slater was cast in Interview with the Vampire only because of a tragic event. Interview with the Vampire is the 1994 gothic horror movie adaptation of the 1976 novel of the same name by Anne Rice.

item.title: Why Dark Knight Rises Is Still Christopher Nolans Biggest Box Office Success 12 Years Later
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Dark Knight Rises was the highest-grossing DC Batman film ever, reaching over $1 billion at the box office. Oppenheimer, despite its brilliance and strong box office performance, couldn’t compete with the success of The Dark Knight Rises. Nolan’s unique directorial style and the popularity of the Batman franchise contributed to the remarkable success of The Dark Knight Rises. Literature ReviewChristopher Nolan’s The Dark Knight Rises remains his highest grossing film and the highest grossing Batman film ever 12 years after its release.

item.title: Why Devon Sawa Didnt Return As Alex In Final Destination 2
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFinal Destination’s protagonist, Alex Browning, is a popular character despite appearing in only one movie of the franchise. Scheduling issues prevented Devon Sawa from reprising his role in Final Destination 2. Jeffrey Reddick, the series creator, had plans for Alex and Clear to have a child if Alex had returned in Final Destination 2. Literature ReviewDevon Sawa’s Alex was the protagonist in Final Destination’s first installment. However, he only made one appearance in the long-running series.

item.title: Why Disney Wanted To Censor 1 Controversial James Cameron Movie Scene 34 Years Later
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDisney’s consideration of censoring a scene from “The Abyss” 34 years after its release highlights the intersection between corporate reevaluation and artistic freedom in the film industry. As audience sensibilities evolve, certain movie moments become more questionable, forcing studios to make censorship decisions. Disney’s decision to potentially censor the controversial scene might have been the right call. The cancellation of the UK 4K release of “The Abyss” showcases the complexities of film production and distribution, including the complications that can arise between studios, production companies, and censor boards.

item.title: Why Donnie Yens First John Wick 4 Action Scene Is So Perfect Detailed By Stuntmen
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCorridor Crew VFX artists and stuntman Gui DaSilva-Greene react to Yen’s first fight scene as Caine in John Wick: Chapter 4, praising the actor’s speed and style. The fight is choreographed to Yen’s strengths, and it includes some of the actor’s moves from previous martial arts movies. Caine is one of the most memorable supporting characters in the franchise, and he seems ripe for further exploration in his own spinoff movie or TV show.

item.title: Why Fast & Furious Paul Walker Turned Down $10m Superman Role
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPaul Walker was offered the role of Superman but turned it down because he didn’t see himself as a good fit. Money wasn’t a determining factor for Walker, as he preferred a toned-down lifestyle. Brendan Fraser also auditioned for the role but lost it due to “studio politics,” and had reservations about being defined by the character. Literature ReviewThe reasons why Fast & Furious’ Paul Walker rejected a $10m role as Superman were recently revealed in the documentary I Am Paul Walker.

item.title: Why Frodo Had To Leave Middle-earth At The End Of Lord Of The Rings
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFrodo leaves Middle-earth for the Undying Lands due to the lasting physical injuries he sustained on his journey, which couldn’t be cured in Middle-earth but would not be fatal in the Undying Lands. Frodo’s decision to leave Middle-earth is also influenced by his emotional trauma and the annual return of the pain from his injuries, which haunted him every year. The Undying Lands can be seen as a metaphor for Frodo making peace with his own traumatic experiences, leaving behind the soldier he was and finding a new life free from the horrors of war.

item.title: Why Godzillas Look Changes In Godzilla x Kong Explained By Director
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDirector Adam Wingard wanted to create his own version of Godzilla in Godzilla x Kong, which is why the monster’s appearance changed from previous films. Wingard also gave Kong a new look in the film, including growing out his beard and adding more grey hair. Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire will be the fifth film in the Monsterverse franchise and is directed by Adam Wingard, who previously helmed Godzilla vs.

item.title: Why Halle Berry Didn t Return For John Wick 4 & What Happened To Sofia
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe film introduced standout new characters while still featuring essential regulars, maintaining the freshness of the series. Halle Berry’s character, Sofia, was absent in John Wick 4, but there are future plans for her return, potentially in her own spinoff movie. Halle Berry would be a suitable replacement for Keanu Reeves to help take the franchise forward. Literature ReviewMany of the franchise’s most popular characters returned for John Wick 4, but Halle Berry did not appear, casting doubt on her character’s future.

item.title: Why Hamilton Harris Felt Exploited Filming Kids
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYKids was a controversial film that challenged societal norms and shed light on the darker aspects of youth culture, including drug use, sexuality, and the AIDS epidemic. Hamilton Harris, one of the non-professional actors in the film, experienced exploitation and personal trauma during the filming process, highlighting the ethical concerns of working with vulnerable actors. The tragic trajectories of some of the Kids cast members, including suicides and untimely deaths, reveal the darker side of sudden exposure to fame and the lack of support for young performers.

item.title: Why Hans Gruber s Die Hard Death Scene Aged So Well
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAlan Rickman’s genuine shock during the scene adds authenticity to Hans Gruber falling to his death in Die Hard. The use of a fake background during the scene has become endearing and nostalgic for audiences. The behind-the-scenes trick of dropping Rickman earlier than expected was necessary to ensure the death scene was done right the first time. Literature ReviewHans Gruber’s death in Die Hard is one of the film’s greatest moments.

item.title: Why Hugh Jackmans Wolverine Was Left Out Of Only 1 X-Men Movie
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHugh Jackman’s absence from the X-Men movie Dark Phoenix was likely due to concerns about the age gap between him and co-star Sophie Turner. Director Simon Kinberg made the decision to exclude Wolverine from Dark Phoenix to prioritize Jean Grey’s story and avoid overshadowing her character. Kinberg’s decision to focus on Jean Grey’s story and be sensitive to the optics of a large age gap is admirable, especially considering the lack of female-led films in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

item.title: Why Iron Claw s Biggest Wrestler Cameo Was Cut
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWrestler MJF’s role in The Iron Claw was reduced to focus on the core story of the Von Erich brothers. MJF supports the decision to cut his scenes, emphasizing the importance of the story between the brothers. Despite his limited role, MJF’s early success in wrestling and dedication to his performances position him well for a potential Hollywood career. Literature Review

item.title: Why J.J. Abrams Keeps Putting R2-D2 In The Strangest Places
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYJ.J. Abrams has included R2-D2 in every movie he has directed as an homage to “Close Encounters of the Third Kind.” Artoo has been a key character in the Star Wars franchise, providing constant companionship and help to the galaxy’s greatest heroes. Artoo’s various appearances in different locations emphasize his significance as a beloved and iconic symbol of the Star Wars series. Literature Review

item.title: Why Jared Leto s Joker Was So Weird
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYJared Leto’s portrayal of the Joker was controversial and divided fans, with his over-the-top performance and modern appearance deviating from traditional depictions of the character. Leto’s method acting and dedication to staying in character led to on-set pranks and unconventional approaches to understanding the Joker’s unstable psyche. Despite limited screen time, Leto’s Joker displayed toxic traits, such as gaslighting and physical and mental abuse towards Harley Quinn, staying true to the character’s comic book counterpart.

item.title: Why Josephine Langford s Tessa Is Barely In After Everything
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe final installment of the After film franchise, After Everything, focuses on Hardin’s personal growth and his attempts to make amends with an ex-girlfriend, rather than on the couple that dominated the previous movies. Tessa’s absence in the final movie is a glaring issue considering her impact on the franchise. However, the limited role of Tessa in After Everything makes sense given the film’s focus on Hardin’s perspective and his journey.

item.title: Why Lorelei Linklater Wanted To Quit Boyhood
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYLorelei Linklater initially eagerly participated in Boyhood but later became uncomfortable with being documented as she went through awkward teenage years. Lorelei Linklater is critical of Boyhood’s gender dynamics, feeling that some female characters lacked depth and personality towards the end. Despite her critiques, Lorelei maintains a sense of honesty with her director dad, expressing her concerns about certain aspects of the film. Literature ReviewRichard Linklater’s Boyhood is one of the most ambitious movies of the 2010s, but Lorelei Linklater wanted to quit the movie, and here’s why.

item.title: Why Mia Goth Plays Both Maxine & Pearl In X
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMia Goth’s dual role as Pearl and Maxine in X is a key reason for the film’s success. The trilogy of X, Pearl (prequel), and MaXXXine (sequel) is held together by Mia Goth’s performances. Mia Goth’s portrayal of both characters underscores the thematic connections between Pearl and Maxine, highlighting their similarities and struggles. Literature ReviewMia Goth plays both Maxine and Pearl in Ti West’s slasher movie X, as well as prequel Pearl, and her dual roles emphasize the horror’s core themes.

item.title: Why Netflixs Lift Feels So Much Like A Fast & Furious Movie
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNetflix’s film Lift, starring Kevin Hart, shares similarities with the Fast and Furious movies, from international settings to high-stakes heists and noble thieves. Lift director F. Gary Gray also directed The Fate of the Furious, further connecting the two films and their action-packed elements. Lift stands out from the Fast and Furious franchise by emphasizing strong female characters and showcasing their crucial contributions to the heist storyline. Literature ReviewNetflix’s Lift seems too similar to the Fast and the Furious movies, making it hard not to wonder if there is a hidden connection between the two.

item.title: Why Reneé Rapp Is The Perfect Regina George For The New Mean Girls Explained By Tina Fey
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTina Fey praises Reneé Rapp’s ability to own a close-up and be intimidating, making her perfect for the screen. Rapp brings subtle and funny acting choices to the role of Regina, adding depth to her performance. Rapp successfully combines the best parts of the original Mean Girls and the Broadway musical, capturing the humor and essence of the character. Literature ReviewExclusive: Mean Girls writer Tina Fey explains why Reneé Rapp is the perfect Regina George, bringing together elements of Broadway and the movie.

item.title: Why Ryan Gosling Hasn t Let His Daughters Watch Barbie Yet
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBarbie’s Ryan Gosling explains why he has not yet let his young daughters watch Barbie. Gosling said that “it gets pretty crazy” to watch one’s father play Ken. Gosling’s critical Barbie song, “I’m Just Ken,” won Best Original Song at the Critics Choice Awards. Literature ReviewBarbie’s main Ken actor Ryan Gosling explains why he has not yet let his young daughters watch Barbie, despite him starring in the film.

item.title: Why Society Of The Snow s Survivors Really Had So Many Cigarettes On The Mountain
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYIn Society of the Snow, cigarettes were crucial for the survivors as they helped stop feelings of hunger. The abundance of cigarettes in the movie is due to Javier Methol’s family tobacco company. The survivors didn’t use the lighters for a signal fire because it would have been pointless and they lacked enough flammable objects. Literature ReviewAlthough the fact that the survivors never ran out of cigarettes in Society of the Snow might seem odd, there is a good explanation for it.

item.title: Why Spider-Man Has To Make A New Suit At The End of No Way Home
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPeter, left with no memories, friends, or family, had to become independent and create a new Spider-Man suit. The new suit symbolizes the end of Peter’s character arc and his ability to be a hero without relying on Tony Stark’s technology. Peter creating his own suit allows him to break free from the criticism of being too dependent on Iron Man and develop his character in new ways. Literature ReviewDue to Doctor Strange’s spell and Spider-Man’s character development, Peter Parker had to create a new suit at the end of Spider-Man: No Way Home.

item.title: Why Taylor Swift Reputation Stadium Tour Left Netflix
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTaylor Swift: Reputation Stadium Tour has been removed from Netflix without explanation. It was a successful concert film that portrayed Swift’s historic tour. The reason for the movie’s removal could be related to the ownership of Taylor Swift’s album Reputation, which has yet to be released in her “Taylor’s Version.” However, fans can still stream Miss Americana on Netflix, a documentary that offers a deep and emotional look into Swift’s life as a global superstar.

item.title: Why The Beekeeper Is Rated R
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYJason Statham’s latest action thriller, The Beekeeper, has received an R rating for its strong violence, pervasive language, sexual references, and drug use. The violence and gore in The Beekeeper are considered severe and consistent throughout the film, which is expected given Statham’s filmography. The Beekeeper will likely be more violent and intense than Statham’s PG-13 films, delivering a similar dose of violence to recent films like Wrath of Man and Redemption.

item.title: Why The Expendables 4 Failed Candidly Explained By Dolph Lundgren
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDolph Lundgren explains the reasons for the failure of The Expendables 4, including a lackluster script and Stallone’s limited involvement. The movie also suffered from a lack of proper promotion due to the SAG-AFTRA strike at the time of its release. The future of the franchise is in doubt, as The Expendables 4 performed poorly at the box office and a female-led spinoff was shelved. Literature ReviewExclusive: Franchise star Dolph Lundgren candidly explains why The Expendables 4 failed with critics and at the box office and his disappointment.

item.title: Why The First Omen s Trailer Plays Backwards
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe teaser trailer for The First Omen showcases creepy and disturbing images in reverse, following the footsteps of the celebrated classic American horror movie it serves as a prequel to. The backwards trailer provides insight into the film’s overall plot and hints at the creepy nature of the movie. The backwards trailer represents the franchise going back to the origin of the evil at its center and pays homage to the history of evil messages in backwards media.

item.title: Why The Little Mermaid s 1989 VHS Cover Was Banned
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe original VHS cover of Disney’s The Little Mermaid was banned due to suggestive artwork featuring phallic imagery. The controversial cover caused a lot of controversy and Disney recalled and replaced the VHS covers. There were additional phallic controversies in The Little Mermaid, including an edited scene and rumors of intentional Easter eggs in Disney movies. Literature ReviewDisney movies may be family-friendly but the release of The Little Mermaid caused controversy with its suggestive imagery on the VHS cover.

item.title: Why The Original Ant-Man Wasn t An Avenger
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHank Pym’s Ant-Man could have been an original Avenger, but his strained history with SHIELD and the Starks prevented his inclusion. The loss of Janet Van Dyne, and Hank Pym’s resignation from SHIELD, contributed to his bitterness and inability to join the Avengers. Hank Pym’s inclusion in What If…? provided some insight into what could have been had he been a part of the original Avengers team. Literature ReviewHank Pym’s Ant-Man could have been featured on the roster of the MCU’s original Avengers team, just like he was in What If…?

item.title: Why Timothy Dalton Left James Bond After Only 2 Movies
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTimothy Dalton’s tenure as James Bond was cut short due to a complicated legal dispute between the rights holders of the franchise. Dalton revealed that he had initially signed a three-film contract, and a third movie was in the works, but it was scrapped because of the lawsuits. Dalton declined the opportunity to return as Bond in another movie when he was asked to sign a longer contract, leading to Pierce Brosnan taking on the role.

item.title: Why Timothy Dalton Still Wanted To Make 1 More James Bond Movie Before Brosnan Became 007
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTimothy Dalton wanted to make a third James Bond film that combined the best parts of his first two films as 007. A legal dispute between Eon Productions and MGM put a halt on the production of the third film, leading Dalton to initially decline continuing as James Bond. Dalton later reconsidered, but declined again when the producer insisted on planning four or five more Bond movies, as he felt it would be “too much, too long.

item.title: Why Treebeard Has Never Heard Of Hobbits In LOTR The Two Towers
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTreebeard, the ancient and wise Ent in The Lord of the Rings, had never encountered Hobbits before meeting Merry and Pippin, despite being nearly as old as Middle-earth itself. The reason for this is that Hobbits were not widely known until the end of the Third Age and remained a private and secluded species. It is possible that Treebeard may have come across Hobbits in the past when he ventured far from his home looking for the Entwives, but he likely never learned their name or considered them important until his encounter with Merry and Pippin.

item.title: Why Winston Shoots John Wick At The End Of John Wick 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYUltimately, Winston shoots John Wick to save him from the High Table — and the brutal consequences they’re both facing for violating the rules. Winston’s support of John lands him on the High Table’s bad side, leading to a negotiation where he seemingly swears his fealty to the council. Winston’s shooting of John is a strategic move to maintain appearances, but, in the end, it continues his ongoing defiance of the High Table.

item.title: Wicked s Movie Adaptation Fixes A Hollywood Mistake From 39 Years Ago
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY“Return To Oz” disappointed fans as a follow-up to “The Wizard of Oz” due to its lackluster homage and dark tone. The film received an Academy Award nomination for Best Visual Effects but failed to attract a following and flopped at the box office. “Wicked” has the advantage of being a musical and is set to become a blockbuster hit, featuring a superstar cast and a built-in following from the successful Broadway musical.

item.title: Wicked s Movie Must Change 1 Key Part Of The Musical (Because Of The Wizard Of Oz)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Wicked movie adaptation needs to change the way it portrays Dorothy from the stage musical, as she is never seen onstage in the original production. It may be challenging for the Wicked movie to replicate the theater trickery that conceals Dorothy’s appearance as a shadowy silhouette onscreen. The Wicked movie should consider giving Dorothy a proper cameo with dialogue and a visible face, potentially introducing a new musical moment for the character.

item.title: Wild Se7en Theory Claims John Doe Wasn t The Movie s Real Killer
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA theory suggests that Detective Somerset was the real “seven deadly sins murderer” and John Doe was just a pawn. Some evidence supporting the theory includes Somerset’s knowledge of Mills’ skills and his odd reaction to the “gluttony” crime scene. If Somerset was the killer, it would change the movie, making Mills’ story even more tragic and raising questions about what really happened to Tracy. Literature ReviewAlthough Se7en leaves no doubt that John Doe was the killer, a theory claims he was a cover and the real killer was part of the police department.

item.title: Willy Wonka & The Chocolate Factory s Hidden Connection To 1 Irish Poet Makes It Even Better
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWilly Wonka & The Chocolate Factory, based on Roald Dahl’s novel, is a highly acclaimed musical movie that has gained a cult following. The movie contains a hidden connection to an Irish poet’s famous work, adding extra suspense and mystery to the story. The tinker character in the film quotes lines from the poem “The Fairies,” giving the chocolate factory an ominous vibe and hinting at the magical and frightening surprises inside.

item.title: Winnie-the-Pooh Blood & Honey 2 s New Images Show A Closer Look At Christopher Robin & Terrifying Pooh
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNew images from Winnie-the-Pooh: Blood and Honey 2 show a close-up of Pooh’s new face and Christopher Robin looking horrified. Although the first movie was critically panned, it performed well enough at the box office to justify a sequel. Blood and Honey 2 will have a bigger budget than the first movie, which will allow for better creature effects, more kills, and the inclusion of characters like Owl and Tigger.

item.title: Wish Box Office Gains Ground Worldwide After Dismal US Performance
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWish gains steam at worldwide box office after underperforming in the US. Wish has now made $223.4 million worldwide. The film has been successful at several international markets, including Spain, Australia, Brazil, the United Kingdom, and Japan. Literature ReviewDisney’s Wish manages to gain traction at the international box office despite months of struggling to perform domestically against a high budget. Wish gains steam at the worldwide box office after failing to make a splash in the United States.

item.title: Wolf Man Reboot Everything We Know About The Blumhouse Monster Movie
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYUniversal’s classic monsters are being resurrected through standalone movies, proven successful by The Invisible Man released in 2020. Julia Garner joins the cast of The Wolf Man, which is confirmed and still on the slate despite past turbulence. The Wolf Man’s connection to the larger monster universe remains unclear, but a successful remake could lead to future tie-ins. Literature ReviewBlumhouse’s Wolf Man reboot has been a long-gestating project, but will the upcoming monster movie ever see the light of day?

item.title: Women Have Been Shaping Star Wars From The Start - Which Is Why It s Time For A Female Director
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWomen have always played influential roles in shaping the Star Wars franchise, from Marcia Lucas to Kiri Hart and Carrie Beck. While there have been female directors on Star Wars TV shows, there has yet to be a woman to direct a Star Wars movie. Sharmeen Obaid-Chinoy’s upcoming Star Wars film, New Jedi Order, will focus on Rey Skywalker and offer a fresh perspective on the Jedi Order. Literature ReviewWomen have long since played a critical role in bringing the galaxy far, far to life.

item.title: Wonder Woman Pitch Meeting — Revisited
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWonder Woman’s ending remains divisive due to the shift to a generic CGI-heavy battle, which some felt undermined the subversive approach and meaningful themes of the rest of the movie. The decision for the Ares battle was pushed by Warner Bros., despite director Patty Jenkins agreeing with criticisms about it being too big and lacking terror. Despite the lackluster final act, Wonder Woman still received praise for Gal Gadot’s performance and her chemistry with Chris Pine, making the movie enjoyable overall.

item.title: Wonka Box Office Dominance Continues Into 2024 With Third #1 Weekend
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWonka is projected to claim the No. 1 spot at the box office for the third time during its fourth weekend in domestic theaters. The movie is a prequel to the original Willy Wonka adaptation and explores the origins of the character. Wonka will make an additional $15.5 million in domestic theaters this weekend. Literature ReviewWonka takes No. 1 at the domestic box office for its third weekend, beating the weekend’s new wide release and multiple holiday titles.

item.title: Wonka Box Office Passes A Major Global Milestone
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWonka has now made $400 million worldwide, comprising $147 million from North America and $253 million internationally. The movie is poised to pass Dune’s $402 million to become the biggest hit of Chalamet’s career. Wonka’s success is due to strong word of mouth and relatively little competition, but it also confirms that Chalamet is a box office draw. Literature ReviewAfter releasing last month, Paul King’s Wonka, which stars Timothée Chalamet as the titular chocolatier, has just passed a big box office milestone.

item.title: Wonka Box Office Passes Huge U.S. Milestone In Under 2 Weeks
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWonka has grossed over $100 million in North America, making it one of just 24 movies to reach that milestone in 2023 so far. It took No. 1 at the box office on the post-Christmas Wednesday with a gross of $8 million. The movie is a prequel to Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory and explores the origins of the legendary candy maker. Literature ReviewWonka has passed an important box office milestone.

item.title: Wonka Box Office Streak Tops Another Record (But Fails To Beat Christmas Competition)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDespite losing the No. 1 spot during Christmas week, Wonka bounced back to the top the following day with a domestic take of $8 million. Wonka came in at No. 2 for Christmas week with a solid gross of $53.1 million, just behind Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom. Wonka is a prequel film that explores the origins of Willy Wonka, with Timothée Chalamet assuming the role of the legendary candy maker.

item.title: Wonka Box Office Triumphantly Returns To No. 1 In Third Weekend Despite Major Competition
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWonka has reclaimed the No. 1 spot at the box office, projected to make $33 million over the New Year’s weekend. The movie had already been No. 1 on the daily chart for three days in a row since the day after Christmas. The film is a prequel to Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory and stars Timothée Chalamet as a young Willy Wonka. Literature ReviewWonka bounces back to No.

item.title: Wonka Breaks 1 Major Theme From The Wilder & Depp Movies (& Makes Willy Wonka So Much Better)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWonka breaks from previous movies, featuring a young, ambitious version of Willy Wonka with a different storyline. The movie explores themes of classicism and capitalism, but its appeal lies in how Willy Wonka defies odds and builds his chocolate empire. Wonka brings an end to the franchise’s toxic parenting trend, portraying the positive impact of healthy parental figures on Willy Wonka’s upbringing. Literature ReviewBoth the Gene Wilder and Johnny Depp Willy Wonka movies had a major theme that Wonka breaks, making Paul King’s version of Willy Wonka much better.

item.title: Yahya Abdul-Mateen II s 10 Best Movies, Ranked
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYYahya Abdul-Mateen II’s versatility and commitment to his craft have propelled his rapid rise in Hollywood, with standout performances in films like Us, The Trial of the Chicago 7, and Candyman. Abdul-Mateen’s portrayal of complex characters in films like Candyman and Ambulance showcases his ability to bring profound emotional depth and intensity to his roles. Whether in supporting or leading roles, Abdul-Mateen consistently captivates audiences with his undeniable magnetism and ability to command attention on screen.

item.title: You Can Watch Society Of The Snow s Biggest Missing Scenes In This 31-Year-Old Ethan Hawke Movie
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSociety of the Snow accurately depicts the 1972 Andes plane crash but leaves out some details highlighted in the movie Alive. Alive focuses more on Nando and Roberto’s 10-day trek through the mountains to find help, while Society of the Snow focuses on the passengers’ time in the Andes and their lives after being rescued. The two movies have different focuses and tell the story from different perspectives, with Alive focusing on the survivors’ tales and Society of the Snow revolving around the stories of the deceased.

item.title: Zack Snyder Explains How Rebel Moon Part 2 Is Different From Part 1
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYZack Snyder reveals that Rebel Moon – Part Two: The Scargiver is more of a “war movie” compared to Part One. The stakes will be higher for the farming colony on Veldt, with the director referring to Kora as “the most wanted fugitive in the history of the galaxy.” Rebel Moon – Part Two: The Scargiver doubling down on action could be concerning since Part One largely prioritizes style over substance, but the upcoming director’s cut could provide more character depth.

item.title: Zack Snyder Has 1 Rebel Moon Spinoff In Mind To Explore One Major Character
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDirector Zack Snyder is considering a possible prequel spinoff to explore the origins of the Rebel Moon character Balisarius. Snyder expressed interest in casting a young actor to play the role of Balisarius in the spinoff, which is why Fra Fee got the role. Snyder says that, if the Rebel Moon story were to continue, Balisarius’s role would significantly increase as the franchise progresses. Literature ReviewWhile this spinoff is not yet in development, Zack Snyder reveals what character he would like to center a new Rebel Moon project around.

item.title: Zack Snyder Honored By Netflix With First-Ever Profile Icon For A Director
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNetflix’s decision to honor Zack Snyder with a profile icon showcases their strong partnership and recognition of Snyder’s iconic status. The success of Snyder’s recent movie, Rebel Moon, further solidifies Netflix’s commitment to him as a director. Snyder and Netflix’s partnership continues to grow, with upcoming projects including a sequel to Rebel Moon, future Army of the Dead installments and a Norse mythology anime series. Literature ReviewNetflix subscribers can now set Zack Snyder as their profile icon as the streamer officially makes him the first director to have one on the platform.

item.title: Zack Snyder Is Doing 1 Thing With Rebel Moon That George Lucas Couldn t With Star Wars Original Trilogy
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYZack Snyder has outperformed George Lucas in the aspect of directing his franchise, as he helmed both the first two Rebel Moon movies, while Lucas stepped away from directing after the first Star Wars film. Snyder’s plans to create a “trilogy of sequels” for Rebel Moon aligns with Lucas directing four Star Wars movies before selling the rights to Disney, indicating that Snyder could potentially direct as many films in his franchise as Lucas did in Star Wars.

item.title: Zack Snyder Reacts To Rebel Moon s Netflix Viewership Success
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYRebel Moon - Part One: A Child of Fire is the No. 1 movie in the world on Netflix, according to director Zack Snyder’s recent Twitter post. The movie is a sci-fi epic set in space, featuring a warrior named Kora who recruits rebels to fight against a corrupt ruling power. Snyder thanked his fans for the streaming success of Rebel Moon. Literature ReviewZack Snyder celebrates the streaming results of the premiere of his new Netflix science fiction movie Rebel Moon - Part One: A Child of Fire.

item.title: Zack Snyder Reveals Details For Sourcebook To Explore Rebel Moon World
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYZack Snyder plans to expand his sci-fi franchise, Rebel Moon, with sequels, an animated series, spinoff comics, and a narrative podcast. Snyder wants to publish a book called “The Great History of the Motherworld” to explore the franchise’s extensive lore and backstory. Despite criticism of Rebel Moon, the movie has attracted a sizable audience, and Snyder may benefit from collaborating with other directors to refine his vision for the franchise.

item.title: Zack Snyder s Lost Justice League 2 Comes To Life In Gritty DC Fan Trailer
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA fan trailer for Justice League 2 brings Zack Snyder’s canceled DC movie to life, featuring Darkseid and a twisted Superman. Snyder’s original plans included a Justice League trilogy and the use of Flashpoint to reboot the DCEU. Despite fan campaigns, the chance of Snyder’s Justice League 2 being made is slim. Literature ReviewSome of Zack Snyder’s Justice League 2 plans have already been revealed, and the director’s lost movie comes to life in an epic new DC fan trailer.

item.title: Zack Snyder Wanted Rebel Moon 2 To Feel Like One Specific Christopher Nolan Movie
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYZack Snyder wanted Rebel Moon: Part Two to feel like Christopher Nolan’s Dunkirk, with a slow start and intense action. The film’s structure could work in favor of delivering a thrilling conclusion to the story of Veldt’s defense. The next movie may redeem elements from the first, focusing on characterization and providing an action-packed thrill ride. Literature ReviewRebel Moon star Ed Skrein says director Zack Snyder wanted Part Two: The Scargiver to feel like a very specific Christopher Nolan movie.

item.title: Zendaya s 10 Best Movies, Ranked
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYZendaya has successfully transitioned from child actress to taking on complex and difficult characters in adult roles, showcasing her versatility and skill. Despite being part of major franchises like MCU and Dune, Zendaya has managed to avoid being pigeonholed and continues to choose diverse projects. From her early work on Disney Channel to her recent roles in high-profile films, Zendaya’s talent and ability as an actress have grown, solidifying her status as a rising star in the industry.

item.title: Zendayas Delayed Movie Gets Stunning New Poster As 2024 Release Date Approaches
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYZendaya’s upcoming movie Challengers has a new poster featuring her character, hinting at the love triangle with her husband and ex-boyfriend. The film’s release date was delayed to April 2024 due to the SAG-AFTRA actors strike, but this allows for more promotion and attention prior to its theatrical release. Challengers could potentially break box office records for tennis movies, with Zendaya’s star power contributing to its potential success. Literature ReviewZendaya’s delayed romance movie Challengers gets a stunning new poster featuring its key stars as the film’s 2024 release date approaches.

item.title: New Star Trek Origin Movie Set Decades Before J.J. Abrams 2009 Film Announced
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: A new theatrical Star Trek movie planned to be an origin set before J.J. Abrams’ Star Trek 2009 movie taps a director and a screenwriter. SUMMARY Paramount Pictures is developing a new Star Trek movie set “decades before” J.J. Abrams’ Star Trek 2009, which will serve as an origin story for the franchise. Previous attempts to make Star Trek 4 have not been successful, but it is still in “active development” as the final chapter of Abrams’ Star Trek saga starring Chris Pine.
